description:
Provides an alias for a KMS customer master key. AWS Console enforces 1-to-1 mapping between aliases & keys,
but API (hence Terraform too) allows you to create as many aliases as
the [account limits](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/kms/latest/developerguide/limits.html) allow you.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Name.description: The display name of the alias. The name must start with the word "alias" followed by a forward slash (alias/).

NamePrefix.description:
Creates an unique alias beginning with the specified prefix.
The name must start with the word "alias" followed by a forward slash (alias/).  Conflicts with `name`.

TargetKeyId.description: Identifier for the key for which the alias is for, can be either an ARN or key_id.
